attributes.action: Stop companies increasing ESSENTIAL utility prices whilst maintaing absurdly high profit margins
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I see the ever increasing prices of ESSENTIAL utilities, yet I here nothing of these companies hacking into their profits to assist consumers.  The bosses still get MASSIVE bonus' and we suffer!
All this from taking resources that are natural.
Seems to me they are taking liberties and the government are allowing it.
I therfore petition the government to stop these companies from overcharging the public so they can continue to recieve large salaries \ bonus schemes.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
